name: PowerShell ADMX wizard
description: PowerShell ADMX Wizard creates custom ADMX/ADML templates from a CSV of registry keys, enabling Windows policies via Intune. It generates GUID-based templates, adds registry entries (STRING, DWORD, BINARY), and logs progress. After creation, upload the ADM/ADML to Intune as Imported ADMX to apply through a configuration profile.
author: Niklas Rast
